subject: Re: Problem in running j2meunit in ANT
msgSnippet: Hi, I modified a build file that comes with j2meunit, and managed to build and run tests on j2me emulator. drope me a mail and i ll send you the demo project
messageBody:
Hi,

I modified a build file that comes with j2meunit, and managed to
build and run tests on j2me emulator.

drope me a mail and i'll send you the demo project

Yehoram
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Carfield Yim" <mailing@d...> wrote:
> Hi, I have the following ant tasks
>
> <target name="emulate" depends="jarMidp">
> <exec executable="${J2MEWTK.HOME}/bin/emulator"
dir="${build.dir}">
> <arg line="-Xdescriptor:fitnessbuddy.jad" />
> </exec>
> </target>
>
> However, when I running unittest in j2meunit application, I have the
> following error
>
> [exec] ALERT: Unable to load class
j2meunit/framework/TestListener
>
> so I try to involve the classpath as follow:
>
> <target name="emulate" depends="jarMidp">
> <exec executable="${J2MEWTK.HOME}/bin/emulator"
dir="${build.dir}">
> <arg line="-Xdescriptor:fitnessbuddy.jad" />
> <arg line="-classpath
>
${build.dir}/fitnessbuddy_midp.jar:${midp_lib.dir}:${lib.dir}/J2MEUnit
1_0.zip"
> />
> </exec>
> </target>
>
> However, I still can't run the unittest, anyone know how to solve?
